title: Looking for new people to play with.
body:
Hi all.
Just a simple post, looking for some nice chill people to play some games with most nights.
I play any and all roles fairly well, but enjoy top/jg/supp most.
Current diamond player but im just looking to have fun and relax when not doing ranked.

So if you would like to play a few games or have a chat then just leave a msg below or add my IGN: shdwzone

Cheers.

replies.body: I'm unranked, but looking for people to play normals with to boost my knowledge. I have added all of you, including OP :-)
i'm keen to play with anyone. silver 3 currently. ign is wealthy big dong :)
Hey im s5 currently, would love to have someone to play normals with and learn things from chill chat all of the above IGN: Locky give me a shout if you want to
